ComicInfo.Summary: Sub-Mariner helps out a friend who is being blackmailed because he thinks he shot his business partner during a struggle over a gun, but it turns out that his fiance shot him and she and the blackmailer got together with the scheme to bleed him of his money by passing the death off as a suicide and keeping quiet about it.
ComicInfo.Title: Payment In Death; The Stolen Republic; Floating Death
ComicInfo.Penciller: Allen Simon,Al Bellman,Mike Sekowsky,Allen Simon,Al Bellman,Mike Sekowsky
ComicInfo.Inker: Al Gabriele,Ken Bald,Alex Schomburg,Al Gabriele,Ken Bald,Alex Schomburg
